name: Mortality Card
details: This card contains the total death caused by COVID-19 around the World.

name: Survival Card
details: This card contains the total number of people who have survived the pademic.

name: Affected Card
details: This card contains the total number of infected persons round the world.

name: Worst Affected Places
details: This card contains the details of country who are the worst affected by COVID -19.

name: Pandemic Details for India
details: This card contains the details of the places affected in India.
